title: Caroline Wozniacki sizzles in blue bikini on delayed honeymoon in Barbados with husband David Lee
text:
She was recently forced to cut her Italian mini-moon due to her demanding work commitments, following her wedding in June.

But Caroline Wozniacki revelled in newlywed bliss as she and husband David Lee enjoyed a romantic catamaran ride during their delayed honeymoon in Barbados earlier this month.

The Danish professional tennis player, 29, highlighted her toned physique in a blue bikini as the former Knicks star, 36, made a cheeky grab for her bottom while relaxing on the luxurious watercraft.

Packing on the PDA: Caroline Wozniacki beamed as husband David Lee cheekily grabbed her bottom on a catamaran during their delayed honeymoon in Barbados earlier this month

Looking every inch the bombshell, the sportswoman stunned in a halterneck bikini top and matching briefs, which she tied in with a floral print kaftan.

The blonde beauty put on a playful display as she sported a multi-coloured headband with cat-inspired ears, and opted for minimal make-up.

Smitten partner David couldn't keep his hands off his new wife as they frolicked on the vehicle during their well-deserved break.

Wow-factor! The Danish professional tennis player, 29, highlighted her toned physique in a blue bikini, which she tied in with a floral print kaftan

All in the details: The blonde beauty put on a playful display as she sported a multi-coloured headband with cat-inspired ears, and opted for minimal make-up

Their trip to the balmy climes of Barbados comes months after they were forced to cut their Portofino mini-moon short in the summer, as Caroline went back to work in preparation for the Wimbledon tennis tournament.

She told MailOnline at the time: 'We went on a mini-moon for a couple of days right after the wedding. We went on a boat.'

Blonde beauty Caroline also revealed that their plans for a 'proper honeymoon' were yet to be set in stone.

She elaborated: 'We're gonna probably do a proper honeymoon after the season, so in November. But nothing's been planned as yet.'

The one-time Grand Slam champion revealed she is also planning on travelling as much of possible with her new husband, before they prepare to have children.

She added: 'I wanna play as long as I feel like it, and then one day start a family and settle down and kinda do our own thing. I definitely want to have just a bit of time just the two of us, because once you have a child things change.

'So, I just want to enjoy us and travel a bit and see the world without having to go somewhere, but going just because we want to go and explore.'

Sportsman David proposed after whisking Caroline off on a sunset cruise during a vacation to Bora Bora in November 2017 - 18 months before they tied the knot.
description: The Danish professional tennis player, 29, revelled in newlywed bliss as she and husband David Lee enjoyed a romantic catamaran ride during their honeymoon in Barbados earlier this month.
